page.title: 03A Kitchen In Ogmore Vale.
page.content: My kitchen is quite big. We have an automatic washing machine which fits under the units. The fridge is next to the sink with the deep fat fryer on top of it. We have a Rayburn Fire which my mother cooks on and it also heats the radiators. We have an electric toaster and an electric toaster and an electric kettle. We keep bread in a bread bin and put things like tins of food in the wall units. We have a microwave which we use quite a lot. We also have a toasted sandwich maker. We have a breakfast bar and eat our meals in the kitchen. Next to the microwave is the coloured television which has remote control.
